short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The perfect tool for developers and web teams! Inspector by Vervaunt Labs is the easiest way to inspect hreflang tags across a site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspector by Vervaunt Labs is a new Chrome extension that enables you to view all the hreflang tags that exist on a web page. With this tool, you can quickly and easily identify the language and regional targeting of a webpage, which can be essential for SEO and internationalisation purposes. The extension is easy to use, clear and organised, allowing you to quickly analyse the data and make informed decisions.
